SELECT FROM ( ) ORDER BY TM_DATE DESC, STN_NM
DUST_NO, TM, STN_NM, LAT, LON, ORG, PM10, AVG
WITH base AS ( SELECT d.DUST_NO, d.TM, d.STN_NM, d.LAT, d.LON, d.ORG, d.PM10, d.AVG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY d.STN_NM ORDER BY d.TM DESC) AS rn FROM DUST d /* WHERE 절은 호출 쿼리에서 구성 */ ) SELECT DUST_NO, TM, STN_NM, LAT, LON, ORG, PM10, AVG FROM base WHERE rn = 1
SELECT FROM ( WITH base AS ( SELECT d.DUST_NO, d.TM, d.STN_NM, d.LAT, d.LON, d.ORG, d.PM10, d.AVG, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY d.STN_NM ORDER BY d.TM DESC) AS rn FROM DUST d WHERE 1=1
AND TRUNC(d.TM) = TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND d.LAT BETWEEN #{minLat} AND #{maxLat} AND d.LON BETWEEN #{minLon} AND #{maxLon} ) SELECT DUST_NO, TM, STN_NM, LAT, LON, ORG, PM10, AVG FROM base WHERE rn = 1 ) ORDER BY TM DESC, STN_NM
FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
